---
title: "DB-IP Data Visualization"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
data <- dbipAnalyzer:::load_processed_data()

stats <- dbipAnalyzer:::get_data_stats(data)
map_data <- head(data, 20)  
ip_map <- dbipAnalyzer:::create_ip_map(map_data, 20)
ip_map


as_chart <- dbipAnalyzer:::create_as_org_chart(data, top_n = 15)
print(as_chart)


data_table <- dbipAnalyzer:::create_table(data, n = 200)
data_table
```
